meanings.definition: Displayed or posted with a sign or notice
meanings.sent1: The placarded door warned visitors of the wet floor ahead.
meanings.sent2: The placarded wall indicated the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: The placarded room made it clear that the cookies were for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent4: Her placarded notebook was a beacon of creativity in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The placarded sign outside the library caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Adorned or decorated with a placard
meanings.sent1: The placarded cake was a delightful centerpiece at the party.
meanings.sent2: The placarded gift box stood out among the presents.
meanings.sent3: She wore a placarded hat that sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The placarded banner added a festive touch to the room.
meanings.sent5: The placarded costume was the highlight of the play.

meanings.definition: Marked with a placard for identification or information
meanings.sent1: The placarded shelves helped customers find their favorite products easily.
meanings.sent2: The placarded map guided hikers through the trail.
meanings.sent3: The placarded menu listed all the delicious options available.
meanings.sent4: His placarded luggage stood out at the airport.
meanings.sent5: The placarded exhibit provided interesting facts about the artwork.
